programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: A teleportation device is found in Egypt, and Scientist Daniel discovers that it transmits him to another planet where humans resemble the ancient Egyptians who worship the God Ra.(n)

programme.title: Predestination
programme.desc: A time-travelling Temporal Agent who must ensure sustaining his career throughout eternity, has to face the one criminal who has eluded him throughout time.(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.(n)

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Set in the late 21st century, the film centers on the crew of the spaceship Prometheus as it follows a star map discovered among the artifacts of several ancient Earth cultures. Seeking the origins of humanity, the crew arrives on a distant world and discovers a threat that could cause the extinction of the human race.(n)

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
programme.desc: During a mission to reach a habitable planet for humans, the crew of a space ship receives a radio transmission that guides them to a nearby planet. But their hopes to find a home in that planet are quickly dashed when they encounter an alien species out of their darkest nightmares.(n)

programme.title: Predestination
programme.desc: A time-travelling Temporal Agent who must ensure sustaining his career throughout eternity, has to face the one criminal who has eluded him throughout time.(n)

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Set in 1869, President Ulysses Grant teams up Special Agent Jim West with inventive US Marshal Artemus Gordon to stop the threats imposed on them at the hands of the psychotic Dr. Arliss Loveless and his diabolical machines.(n)

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: When (Chris Brander) decides to take the next step in his relationship with (Jamie), but she only wants them to be friends, he goes to Los Angeles and becomes an attractive guy who works in the music industry. He travels with a new singer (Samantha) till he returns to his home town.(n)

programme.title: A Case of You
programme.desc: Sam Newman, a writer, fails to get the girl of his dreams. He claims to be an athletic, courageous and charismatic person on social media to change his luck and succeeds in his plan and attracts his dream girl Birdie. Sam pretended to be someone else whenever around Birdie and eventually had to tell her the truth before it was too late.(n)

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: The romance between Rachel and Nick faces an unexpected hurdle when Nick takes Rachel to his home in Singapore to attend his best friend's wedding, only for Rachel to discover that she is dating the heir of one of the wealthiest families in Singapore, a family that judges her unfit for their son.(n)

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: When his self-destructive behavior leaves his career circling the drain, a chef looks for a fresh start in trying to assemble a team of top-notch chefs in order to achieve his dream of starting a restaurant worthy of three Michelin stars.(n)

programme.title: Two Night Stand
programme.desc: After two people make an online connection that leads to a one-night stand, they wake up to find themselves snowed in after sleeping through a blizzard that put all of Manhattan on ice. They have to extend their first night and turn it into a two-night stand.(n)

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Set in the late 21st century, the film centers on the crew of the spaceship Prometheus as it follows a star map discovered among the artifacts of several ancient Earth cultures. Seeking the origins of humanity, the crew arrives on a distant world and discovers a threat that could cause the extinction of the human race.(n)

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: A teleportation device is found in Egypt, and Scientist Daniel discovers that it transmits him to another planet where humans resemble the ancient Egyptians who worship the God Ra.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April O'Neil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vernon Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredder's diabolical plan.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, the multinational OmniCorp is at the center of robot and weapon technology. When Alex Murphy, a loving father and a good cop is seriously injured, OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer. But Alex's life begins to change and turns upside down.

programme.title: Power Rangers
programme.desc: A group of high-school kids with exceptional and unique superpowers, harness their abilities in order to save the world.

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Mason and Olivia are a divorced couple trying to raise their young son, Mason Jr. The film follows the boy's life for twelve years, from first grade at age 6, till the twelfth grade, examining his relationship with his parents all the way through.

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Auggie, a kid who was born with facial differences, goes to a mainstream elementary school for the first time. There, his family, community and classmates all struggle with their acceptance and compassion towards him. He unites them all with his fascinating journey where he shows that you can’t fit in if you were born to stand out. Auggie, a kid who was born with facial differences, goes to a mainstream elementary school for the first time. There, his family, community and classmates all struggle with their acceptance and compassion towards him. He unites them all with his fascinating journey where he shows that you can’t fit in if you were born to stand out.

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Finn and his ex-wife Tess embark on a treasure hunt that rekindles the flames of their love.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A group of famous illusionists called the "Four Horsemen" are being chased by an FBI agent and an Interpol detective after they pull off major bank heists during their performances and shower the audience with money.

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In the world of magic and optical illusions, the Four Horsemen face a tech genius who tries to exploit them, and they must clear their names before society and reveal the truth through one last stunt.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Tuck and Frank (Tom Hardy and Chris Pine) are two best friends and CIA agents. They fall in love with the same girl, Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). She's confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her.

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: Audrey and Morgan, are two best friends in their thirties who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when Audery's ex-boyfriend suddenly shows up at their apartment with a team of deadly assassins on his trail.

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Cameron (Mark Ruffalo) is a depressed father who is addicted to alcohol, trying in various ways to regain his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana) by taking full responsibility of his young daughters. In his attempt to deal with them, participate in their daily life, and do some chores, the girls do not make this task easy for the father.

programme.title: Wonder

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: The 11-year-old Anna Fitzgerald enlists the help of a lawyer to earn medical release from her parents, who want her to donate her kidney to save the life of her elder sister Kate who has leukemia.(n)

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A group of humans who survived a devastating virus that has struck the planet a decade earlier, are at peace with genetically evolved apes led by Caesar. Proven fragile, peace is broken and a war begins between both sects that will determine who will dominate Earth.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: After a devastating confrontation between the intelligent apes and a rogue army unit, Caesar must fight to balance his desire to avenge his slain wife and son, and his responsibility towards his tribe that is being hunted by the ruthless leader of the army unit.(n)

Dr. Adrian Helmsley is an American geologist who, while on a trip to India, learns that there has been increased solar activity. Dr. Helmsley also discovers that this will lead to a rise in the temperature of Earth’s core – a phenomenon which will have dire consequences for humanity. 2012 is said to be the end date of the Mayan calendar, which many believe marks the end of the world.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.(n)

programme.title: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft's father goes missing after he sets off to find the ancient dagger of Xian. She goes looking for him on an exotic Chinese island. Croft assigns her father’ old friend, Lu Ren as her guide on the island, but they have to deal with the consequences of their disastrous journey and find themselves trying to survive.(n)

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Tuck and Frank (Tom Hardy and Chris Pine) are two best friends and CIA agents. They fall in love with the same girl, Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). She's confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her.(n)

programme.title: Ninja Assassin
programme.desc: When his lover Kiriko is murdered, the young ninja Raizo turns his back on the orphanage that raised him and exacts his vengeance on those who killed her.(n)

programme.desc: A super hero works for civil security in Los Angeles, and due to his recklessness causes millions of dollars worth of damages which he then tries to make up for by improving his image.(n)

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.(n)

programme.title: Insurgent
programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: Peter Quill finds himself chased by Ronan (Lee Pace) after stealing a mysterious orb. In order to evade Ronan, Peter must work with Gamora (Zoe Saldana), Rocket (Bradley Cooper), Drax (Dave Bautista) and Groot (Vin Diesel). Peter soon discovers the true power of the orb and the danger it poses to the entire universe.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2
programme.desc: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team's adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage. Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.(n)

Truman is one of America's most famous people, but he certainly does not know it.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men S4
Two and a Half Men S4
After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.

programme.title: Adventures of a Mathematician
programme.desc: Based on a true story; in the 1930s, Stan Ulam, a Polish-born mathematician, travels to the United States, where he joins the Manhattan Project and helps create the first computer.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: In the Key of Love
programme.desc: After walking away from her former life to take over her grandmother's wedding photography business, the past comes calling for Maggie when she is hired for the wedding of her ex-boyfriend's sister. It turns out that there is still a spark between the two, just waiting to be reignited.

programme.title: Rome in Love
programme.desc: With her dreams of being an actress about to come true, Amelia needs to keep the news of her casting as the lead in the remake of Roman Holiday under wraps. But once she meets a journalist tasked with writing about the mysterious new lead of the movie, all bets are off as romance comes knocking.

programme.title: The Iron Mask
programme.desc: When the English traveler Jonathan Green receives an order to map the Russian Far East from Peter the Great, he goes yet on another adventure full of ups and downs that will eventually lead him to China, where he will face many unexpected encounters.

During World War I, two British soldiers go on an impossible mission, where they must enter the enemy territory, to deliver a message to prevent their beleaguered troops from marching towards a deadly trap.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.

programme.title: Sitting in Limbo
programme.desc: After he is wretched living in the UK for 50 years, the Jamaican-born man, Anthony Bryan, struggles during the Windrush scandal to be accepted as a British Citizen, as well as falling victim to the UK Home Office, at which he is considered an illegal immigrant and is threatened of deportation.

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: An ice driver leads a high-stakes rescue mission to save trapped miners after a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada.

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A daring synthetic biologist, having lost his family in a car accident, will stop at nothing to bring them back, even if it means going up against a government-controlled laboratory and the physical laws of science.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A boxer travels with his brother, who is managing him, for a final boxing match. But when an unexpected travel companion joins them, truths and cracks in the two brothers' relationship come to the surface.

programme.title: Galveston
programme.desc: As he barely escapes a fatal set up by his mobster boss, hitman Ryan finds himself accompanied by Rocky, a young prostitute that he saves, as he tries to find his way back to his hometown to recuperate and plan his revenge.

programme.title: Love Song
programme.desc: After both Duke Sterling and Grady Connor agree on musical collaboration, a dispute arises between them over songwriting, which makes Connor's manager persuade him to write one song for Duke to participate in a music festival, and there Connor gets to meet the country singer Shayna.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.

programme.title: Sitting in Limbo
programme.desc: After he is wretched living in the UK for 50 years, the Jamaican-born man, Anthony Bryan, struggles during the Windrush scandal to be accepted as a British Citizen, as well as falling victim to the UK Home Office, at which he is considered an illegal immigrant and is threatened of deportation.

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: An ice driver leads a high-stakes rescue mission to save trapped miners after a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada.

programme.title: Love Locks
programme.desc: In the City of Light, Lindsey fell in love with Jack while studying at the Sorbonne, a romance that quickly ended when she went back to the US. Twenty years later, Lindsey returns to Paris with her daughter, only to run into Jack who quickly catches feelings for her all over again.

programme.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
programme.desc: When a fire breaks out in the prison for the mentally ill, Dr. Albert Beck runs away and takes a shelter in an abandoned house, after which he's surprised to find that his hideout is the new house of a woman and her 18-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.

programme.title: Jane Fonda in Five Acts
programme.desc: A documentary about the American actress, activist, environmentalist, fashion model and fitness coach Jane Fonda, through diving deep into her personal life, her relationship with her father Henry Fonda and the great efforts she made to become who she is.

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: In this sequel, John Wick has killed a member of the High Table, a shadowy international assassin's guild, deeming him an excommunicado (excluded member) and raising a US$ 14 million price tag for his head. A whole world of ruthless hit men and women are pursuing him around every corner.

programme.title: Embattled
programme.desc: A young man seeks to become an MMA fighter like his estranged father, all the while struggling not to get carried away with violence like him.

programme.title: Born a Champion
programme.desc: Black-belt BJJ fighter Mickey Kelley loses in an MMA match against Marco Blaine. Years later, it is revealed that the latter cheated, upon which Kelley finally gets a rematch.

programme.title: Jane Fonda in Five Acts
programme.desc: A documentary about the American actress, activist, environmentalist, fashion model and fitness coach Jane Fonda, through diving deep into her personal life, her relationship with her father Henry Fonda and the great efforts she made to become who she is.

programme.title: Love in Design
programme.desc: With the ratings for her home renovation TV show in decline, Hannah is robbed into returning to her hometown to take on a new job that will take her show in a new direction: restoring a historical manor. Assigned to oversee her work is architect Jeff, who just happens to be her ex-boyfriend.(n)

programme.desc: After Sonic the Hedgehog comes to Earth, he hides in the town of Green Hills, and is helped by the town's Sheriff to escape the evil Dr. Robotnik who's hired by the government to capture him.(n)

programme.title: The Comeback Trail
programme.desc: Two cash-strapped movie producers who owe money to the mob draw a scheme to bring back an aging movie star for an insurance scam in order to use his insurance policy to pay off their own debts, but they get more than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Villain
programme.desc: The ex-criminal Eddie Franks attempts to get his life back on track, as he reconnects with his daughter and pays his brother's debt. But he soon finds his past catching up with him when he gets embroiled in his old life once again.(n)

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.(n)

programme.title: Oslo

One day terrifying facts begin to emerge, which makes Christine try to look for explanations, and answers from all those around her, especially after consulting with the doctor (Nash) who tries to help her.

programme.title: Wrongfully Accused
programme.desc: When violinist Ryan Harrison becomes the main suspect for the murder of a millionaire, he sets out to prove his innocence while getting into a series of crazy situations.

programme.desc: When she accidentally discovers a disturbing video from a night she can't remember, 16-year-old Mandy tries to figure out what happened and how quickly everything came down around her.

programme.desc: When her boyfriend is killed, Maddy is accused of being the culprit, but she points the finger at her own mother instead. Little do they both know that the boyfriend was never the target, and that real culprit is closer than they think.

programme.title: Dead Over Diamonds: Picture Perfect Mysteries
programme.desc: When a diamond necklace is stolen, Det. Sam enlists the help of the photographer Allie to find it. The last thing they expect during their investigation is for it to point them straight to an unexpected death.

programme.desc: Hailey Dean, who was working in the attorney general's office, decides to quit her job to work as a counselor in marital affairs and a psychiatrist.

programme.desc: A new student must find someone to date the most depressing girl in school, in order to take her little sister, who he likes, on a date, who's not allowed to date anyone till her older sister is on a date first.

programme.desc: When Mina's work sends her back to her hometown, she must contend with old feelings as her encounters with her former sweetheart Clay, whom she is trying to convince to sell his restaurant, stir old feelings for her.

programme.desc: Alberto, gets lost on a school trip to a fort called El Real Felipe in Callao, and he enters a portal that sends him to the 17th century. He discovers that Dutch pirates will attack Callao under Jacques L'Hermite, who wants to steal the king's gold and invade Callao.(n)

programme.title: Krazzy Planet
programme.desc: Life on planet Krazzy,is full of fun and prosperity,until a galaxy tyrant decides to invade the planet. Two brave heroes team up with a scientist to confront the invasion attempt to show the true essence of the people of planet Krazzy.(n)

programme.title: The Secret of Kells
programme.desc: Little Brendan lives far away under the siege of barbarian raids during the Middle Ages. But a new life of adventures begins when a famous master illuminator arrives, bringing with him an unfinished ancient book full of wisdom and secrets.(n)

programme.title: Kurt Turns Evil
programme.desc: Kurt discovers that society doesn't appreciate forklift operators. When he finds everyone around him has respectable jobs, he decides to turn to a life of crime and become vicious.(n)

programme.title: The Great Bear
programme.desc: Jonathan is an 11-year-old boy who usually spends his vacations with his grandfather, who lives on the edge of a forest filled with mythical animals. When his little sister Sophie joins him, he tries to avoid her, till she gets kidnapped by a giant bear and it's up to him to rescue her.(n)

programme.title: Victor and the Secret of Crocodile Mansion
programme.desc: When Victor and his family move to his mysterious uncle's seemingly haunted mansion, the young detective makes it his mission to solve the case of a girl who died there 40 years ago.(n)

programme.title: Funny Little Cars
programme.desc: In a world inhabited by cars, Grady tries to educate the other cars about important environmental issues and the havoc that is being wreaked on the ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Possum
programme.desc: Phillip, a puppeteer, has a troubled past and a fixation on a creepy puppet that he works with. When he is forced to confront his past and his evil step-father after he returns to his childhood home, he soon comes to discover that confronting the demons of his past can have dire consequences.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: John Wick (Keanu Reeves) a former professional assassin,whose peaceful life is disturbed when a thief breaks into his house, steals his car, and kills his dog. He seeks revenge on this thief, and discovers that his father is a Russian gang leader, who sets a reward for those who kill John.

programme.title: Jonathan
programme.desc: (Jonathan) leaves the office every day at noon, and when he returns home, he goes to sleep, wakes up every morning, finds his breakfast prepared with a video telling him about the second part of his day.

programme.title: High Life
programme.desc: Set in the future beyond the solar system, a group of criminals accept a space mission in which they become subjects of a human reproduction experiment. But they find themselves in an unthinkable position when their space ship hits a storm of cosmic rays.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock is a blind lawyer who has a secret identity; as he fights criminals at courtrooms by day, he's the masked vigilante Daredevil by night. He vows to fight crime and faces off against a criminal leader known as the Kingpin.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: After chasing and hunting down hundreds of criminals, Frank Castle "The Punisher" confronts his strongest and most fierce enemy yet: "Jigsaw.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: Wade Wilson, AKA Deadpool, has a new mission to protect a little boy with extraordinary powers, who’s being chased by the time traveling cyborg assassin Kaleb – he forms his very own team of Superheroes to assist him.

programme.title: Blowtorch
programme.desc: When her eldest son is killed, the widowed Ann is determined to solve his murder and find out the killer. When the detective assigned to the case does not offer her sufficient answers, she decides to take the investigation into her own hands.

programme.title: Hunter's Prayer
programme.desc: Sam, an assassin who is appointed to kill a woman, fails to pull the trigger to kill her. He then eventually has to cooperate with her to escape the ones who had killed her family and bring them to justice.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: Will Smith and son Jaden co-star as the legendary Cypher and son Kitai, who crash land on an abandoned Earth a millennium after humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, teenage Kitai has to brave the hostile environment, brimming with aggressive evolved animal species and aliens, on his own to look for help.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiast Abby Yates and physicist Erin Gilbert form an unlikely paranormal investigating team with engineer Jillian Holtzmann and subway worker Patty Tolan. As ghouls descend on Times Square, the four women uncover a plot to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts to New York City.

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: When Terri opens her home to the victim of a car accident, she has no idea that she has just invited danger into her house. The man, Colin, turns out to be an escaped convict with a hidden agenda that leaves the lives of Terri and her children on the line.

programme.desc: David, a teenager with teleportation abilities, finds himself in a local library where he discovers his ability to 'jump' from one place to another. He decides to make use of this newly-acquired ability to leave his abusive father and plan a stable life for himself.(n)

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne reports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife.

programme.title: Can You Keep a Secret?
programme.desc: Fearing a plane crash, the drunk Emma confesses her deepest secrets to the man sitting next to her who turns out to be her company's CEO. As love blossoms between them, Emma struggles with their uneven relationship born out of him knowing everything about her, and her knowing nothing about him.

programme.title: Tolkien
programme.desc: The film deals with the period of childhood and youth of the great writer J.R.R. Tolkien, the author of The Hobbit and Lord of the Rings, the love story that shaped his life, and the experience of World War I in which he participated in.

programme.title: Broken Vows
programme.desc: When he is rejected by the woman he initially seduced during a bachelorette party, the charm of a young man turns into terror as he spirals into a fit of anger and his troubled side manifests.

programme.desc: Theresa's plans to introduce her boyfriend Simon to her family go awry when her neglect to tell them that Simon is white backfires on her. Her father's dislike of her new boyfriend prompts him to look into Simon's background, which causes mayhem in the family.
